title: Foul Changes, More Physical Play In The NBA
description:
Brian Windhorst, Ohm Youngmisuk and Marc J. Spears discuss their thoughts on the new foul rules being enforced, scoring being down across the league, the Nets’ struggles on offense, a strong start to the season for the Warriors and some impressive showings from the rookies around the NBA.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Impressive Start To The Warriors Season, Lower Free Throws Across The League
